events.message: I ordered a laptop two weeks ago, but it still hasn’t arrived. The tracking info hasn’t updated for several days.
The customer’s complaint about late delivery has been classified under Delivery Delay for proper handling.
Agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the case regarding the delayed shipment of the laptop.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand your shipment is delayed, and I’m here to help resolve this issue.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking ID you have so I can check the latest status for you?
My order number is 12345 and the tracking ID is XZ7890. The last update was five days ago that it left the warehouse.
I checked with our shipping partner and found an unexpected delay due to weather. Your package should arrive within the next 3 business days.
Thank you for the update. I understand the delay was out of your control, and I appreciate the quick reply.
We’ve noted the delay and will monitor the shipment. Please contact us if it doesn’t arrive within three days. Thank you for your patience.
Just following up to ensure your laptop has arrived. Let us know if you need any further assistance or if there are any issues.
Since your shipment has been delivered and no further issues were reported, your case is now closed. Thank you for choosing our service.
